duties_responsibilities.duty: Process teller transactions, open new membership accounts, complete consumer loan applications, and provide general account information.
Identify members' financial needs and offer AFFCU products and services to fulfill those needs.
Strengthen relationships with members through face-to-face or phone conversations to cross-sell and up-sell credit union products and services.
Provide exemplary member experience that meets and exceeds members' expectations.
Ensure accurate and professional processing of transactions and acknowledgment of members.
Open and maintain accounts, process consumer loan applications, and provide members with general account information.
Maintain a balanced cash drawer and observe and report any suspicious behavior.
Provide backup support to other employees as needed.
Perform all other duties as required.
